data.actual_result: It Shows the Ban/Kick User Button.
data.short_description: When youre in a game and are in the overlay the Kick and Ban user button is shown even when you cant kick/ban that person
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Ingame Overlay - Have permissions to Ban/Kick - click on a Person over your Rang in any Server - it should show Ban/Kick User - It shouldnt work though.
